item.description:

36th Annual Performance of the RI Philharmonic
(rain date July, 14th)

The festivities will take place on Narragansett Beach at the North Beach Clubhouse starting with a performance of the Notables at 7:00 pm followed by the Rhode Island Philharmonic at 8:00 pm. The two hour concert has been a time honored tradition in Narragansett for 36 years. We are please and proud to be able to continue this tradition and bring this wonderful concert to our residents and visitors of Narragansett.

Aiming to leave at 5:00pm for 6:00pm arrival - gets crowded. If you'd like to go earlier and enjoy the beach, please let me know. If you can't come till later, just come when you can. Be sure to take my cell so you can find us - I will have something on hand to help you find us - will post when gets closer to date.

Deb's cell 508-415-0590

Post in RSVP if you'd like to carpool.

Bring chair or blanket to sit on, appetizer to share and BYOB.
item.how_to_find_us: North Beach Clubhouse - take my cell
item.name: RI Philharmonic Performance on the Beach
